name: Alice in Wonderland: Hidden Objects
description:
Alice is on a quest to find Hidden Objects in Wonderland. An exciting Hidden Object game based on a Lewis Carroll’s Alice in Wonderland.

Help Alice solve challenging puzzles and uncover secrets of Wonderland!
Explore the beautiful fantasy world in this exciting adventure!

There are three types of games in seven gorgeous locations, including room interiors, gardens, etc.:

1. Find hidden objects according to the object list.
2. Discover hidden objects by their outline.
3. Look for pairs of similar objects.

Play all levels more than once with different sets of objects!

NO IN-APP PURCHASES - JUST INSTALL AND ENJOY!

We'll be happy to stay in touch with you at www.facebook.com/CrispApp : leave comments, ask questions and get news about coming games!
